alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 19 at 3:30AM EST until February 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will cause occasional whiteout conditions in snow and blowing snow. * WHERE...Northern Houghton and Keweenaw Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Considerable blowing and drifting of snow across highways along with occasional whiteout conditions will result in hazardous travel through the early morning hours. Cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
